basics.label: Project Coordinator Associate
basics.summary: CES Talent Management Associate successful at designing company-wide onboarding, orientation and mentoring programs. Team-oriented Training and Development Coordinator who efficiently develops training processes and procedures for human resources teams.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Coordinated tracking the Installation Quality Audit reports, streamlined common processes for the 9 box review for Global Off-Highway Customer Engineering Application Engineers. Supported the team's learning and usage of new technology available such as Cummins Connect and Outlook 365.
highlights: IQA audits are complete in less than five days.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Facilitated modules during CES site OnBoarding. Coordinated logistics to ensure participants were in a great learning environment.  Process Improved by participating on a team to update the Aftertreatment 101 module.
highlights: 80% of US exempt and office employees attended CES Site OnBoarding within their first 90 days of employment with CES

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Assisted in the management of a 152 unit apartment community.

work.name: Company Name
highlights: Used Project Based Learning (PBL) techniques that helped students see the connection between classroom learning and real world application

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Developed, planned and implemented summer and after school programs for over 200 youth ages 5-18.
